abstract: Presents a system dialog for allowing the user to move an existing file to a new location.

declaration.code: nonisolated func fileMover(isPresented: Binding<Bool>, file: URL?, onCompletion: @escaping (Result<URL, any Error>) -> Void, onCancellation: @escaping () -> Void) -> some View

overview:
## Discussion

For example, a button that allows the user to move a file might look like this:

items.description: Presents a system interface for allowing the user to move an existing file to a new location.
items.name: fileMover(isPresented:file:onCompletion:)

items.description: Presents a system interface for allowing the user to move a collection of existing files to a new location.
items.name: fileMover(isPresented:files:onCompletion:)

items.description: Presents a system dialog for allowing the user to move a collection of existing files to a new location.
items.name: fileMover(isPresented:files:onCompletion:onCancellation:)

title: fileMover(isPresented:file:onCompletion:onCancellation:)
